title: Sources: Eagles make Barkley NFL's top-paid RB
description: The Eagles are rewarding Saquon Barkley with a two-year, $41.2 million contract extension that makes him the highest-paid running back in NFL history, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
author: Tim McManus

title: Jets continue overhaul, release star WR Adams
description: The Jets released wide receiver Davante Adams as they embark on the post-Aaron Rodgers era.
author: Rich Cimini

title: As bad as things are in Dallas, Kyrie Irving's ACL injury is worse news for the player
description: In the aftermath of Irving's injury news, it's easy to focus on all that's gone wrong since the Luka trade. But that's not fair to one of the NBA's best players.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: George Mason breaks NCAA baseball record with 23 runs in 1 inning without hitting a home run
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Record-breaking Arsenal enjoy carnival season in Eindhoven
description: Eindhoven is packed with carnival-goers but on Tuesday it was Arsenal enjoying their own party, setting a Champions League record in the process.

title: 'Unfinished business' - Mings redemption has Villa dreaming
description: From the "biggest mistake" to an "incredible" performance against Club Brugge - Tyrone Mings helps Aston Villa take a huge step towards the Champions League quarter-finals.

title: FA reveals Slot's X-rated rant that led to red card at Everton
description: The FA has revealed Arne Slot's X-rated rant that led to him being shown a red card after full-time of Liverpool's 2-2 draw at Everton last month.

title: Fleetwood beats Lowry to TGL top spot after comeback win
description: Tommy Fleetwood claimed bragging rights over Ryder Cup teammate Shane Lowry after helping Los Angeles Golf Club to a comeback victory over The Bay in their top-of-the-table TGL clash.
